    // Save as MP3
    names := strings.Split(*fileName, ".")
    name := names[0]
    mp3File := name + ".mp3"

    outFile, err := os.Create(mp3File)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println("Got an error creating the file " + mp3File + ":")
        fmt.Print(err)
        return
    }

    defer outFile.Close()
    _, err = io.Copy(outFile, output.AudioStream)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println("Got an error saving the MP3 to the file:")
        fmt.Print(err)
        return
    }
